headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Benny’s Original Motor Works
content:
Exciting new vehicle modification options are available courtesy of Benny’s Original Motor Works. Check out www.bennysoriginalmotorworks.com, or use the app shortcut on your phone to see Benny's latest project cars.

Buy the car you want to work on, then take it to Benny himself in the heart of Los Santos. Get access to a host of new mods, including hydraulics and custom interiors after purchasing an upgrade.

Lamar will be in touch to help get your foot in the door.
